I'd highly recommend checking out "Looper" if you enjoy espionage and intricate plotlines. It features Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Bruce Willis in a time-traveling thriller that is both thought-provoking and action-packed!

If you're looking for something different, "It's a Wonderful Life" is a timeless classic with a unique take on the power of personal connections. Donna Reed and Jimmy Stewart star in this heartwarming tale about discovering the impact one life can have on the world. Enjoy!

Based on your preference for Polish films written by T. Lewis, I'd highly recommend watching "The Border". This gripping story follows a corrupt border agent who aims to clean up his act after an impoverished woman's baby is put up for sale on the black market. Starring Marian Dziedziel and Jaroslaw Boberek, it's a captivating drama that will keep you on the edge of your seat!

If you're interested in delving deeper into period dramas, 'Pride and Prejudice' might also be an enjoyable watch for you. Set in 19th-century England, this classic film explores themes of love, social class, and family dynamics amidst the backdrop of a Pride march. Enjoy the beautiful costumes and engaging performances!
